sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './App.css'; // Import CSS file for styling function App() { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [age, setAge] = useState(''); const [gender, setGender] = useState(''); const [occupation, setOccupation] = useState(''); const [city, setCity] = useState(''); const [education, setEducation] = useState(''); const [fatherName, setFatherName] = useState(''); const [motherName, setMotherName] = useState(''); const [dob, setDob] = useState(''); const [birthTime, setBirthTime] = useState(''); const [birthPlace, setBirthPlace] = useState(''); const [gotra, setGotra] = useState(''); const [nakshatra, setNakshatra] = useState(''); const [photo, setPhoto] = useState(null); const [bioData, setBioData] = useState(null); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Assuming photo is uploaded and stored separately, we just use the name here const photoUrl = photo ? photo.name : ''; const data = { name, age, gender, occupation, city, education, fatherName, motherName, dob, birthTime, birthPlace, gotra, nakshatra, photoUrl }; setBioData(data); }; const downloadBioData = () => { const element = document.createElement("a"); const file = new Blob([JSON.stringify(bioData)], {type: 'text/plain'}); element.href = URL.createObjectURL(file); element.download = "bio-data.txt"; document.body.appendChild(element); // Required for this to work in FireFox element.click(); }; return (

Biodata Generator for Marriage

{/* Personal Details */}

Personal Details

Name (नाव) setName(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> Age (वय) setAge(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> Gender (लिंग) setGender(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" > {/* Education and Occupation */}

Education and Occupation

Occupation (व्यवसाय) setOccupation(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> City (शहर) setCity(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> Education (शिक्षण) setEducation(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> {/* Family Details */}

Family Details

Father's Name (वडीलांचे नाव) setFatherName(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> Mother's Name (आईचे नाव) setMotherName(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> {/* Birth Details */}

Birth Details

Date of Birth (जन्म तारीख) setDob(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> Birth Time (जन्म वेळ) setBirthTime(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> Birth Place (जन्म ठिकाण) setBirthPlace(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> {/* Astrology Details */}

Astrology Details

Gotra (गोत्र) setGotra(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> Nakshatra (नक्षत्र) setNakshatra(e.target.value)} className="custom-input" /> {/* Photo */}

Photo (फोटो)

Upload Your Photo (तुमची फोटो अपलोड करा) setPhoto(e.target.files[0])} className="custom-input" />
{bioData && (

Your Biodata (तुमचा बायोडाटा)

{Object.entries(bioData).map(([key, value]) => (

{key}: {value}

))}
)} {bioData && ( )} ); } export default App;
